mapper.update: update stock set memberId = #{memberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productName = #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productSpec = #{productspec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productFactory = #{productfactory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productMark = #{productmark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total = #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, warehousename = #{warehousename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stockOutType = #{stockouttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quality = #{quality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crt = #{crt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upt = #{upt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, memberId, productName, productSpec, productFactory, productMark, num, weight, price, unit, total, warehousename, stockOutType, quality, remark, status, crt, upt from stock where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
